mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restaurants (name, location, rate, title, content, update_date, users_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{location}, #{rate}, #{title}, #{content}, #{updateDate}, #{usersId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM restaurants WHERE id=#{id} AND users_id = #{usersId}
